| History                 = The Goreks were a tribe of [[humans]] that existed in the year 50,000 BC. They were a tribe of savages who were known for eating human brains. When the cave boy [[Tuk (Earth-616)|Tuk]] began his quest to find his home [[Atlantis]] he would run into a pack of Goreks who attacked him. Tuk was rescued by the Cromagnon man known as [[Tanir (Earth-616)|Tanir]] who slew the Goreks attacking the boy.{{Citation}}

Further accounts of Gorek activities are unrecorded, and it is likely they are long extinct.
